mapper.select: SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(NOTICE_REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') NOTICE_REG_DT, NOTICE_CHK, EMP_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_NO = #{notice_no}
